li.label: strange smell
li.description: What is that smell? Maybe some sort of a floor cleaner?

li.label: unpleasant smell
li.description: This place smells unpleasant. Looks like it's ammonia.

li.label: bad smell
li.description: There is a strong smell of ammonia in the air. It looks like it comes from those small feathered aliens.

li.label: stench
li.description: Smell going from those feathered aliens intolerable. I think I need to urgently get out for some fresh air.

li.label: strong stench
li.description: How those small feathered aliens can have so horrible smell? Looks like I need a gas mask.

li.label: unbearable stench
li.description: The smell from those feathered aliens... It's horrible... It seems to me to throw up now...

li.label: hot
li.description: It's too hot here. Becomes difficult to breathe.

li.label: very hot
li.description: It's way too hot here. If I could just have a breath of cool air...

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot. I feel that I'm boiling alive!

li.label: bad singing
li.description: That more looks like noises then singing.

li.label: content singing
li.description: Not bad, but nothing more.

li.label: good singing
li.description: That guy looks like a talent!

li.label: beautiful singing
li.description: For a long time I have not heard anything like that. What a beautiful voice...

li.label: wonderful singing
li.description: Not in vain Avali considered as the best singers in the galaxy. This is one of the most beautiful song what I heard in a whole my life!

li.label: horrible singing
li.description: My talons make much pleasant noices than the mouth of this guy. Somebody tell him to shut up!

li.label: bad singing
li.description: Aghh... than noice totally not a singing, more like a crackle of ice or a gnash of metal...

li.label: content singing
li.description: Any Avali can sing like that.

li.label: good singing
li.description: I like it. I would not say that the best voice I ever heard, but It still good.

li.label: beautiful singing
li.description: Wow! What a beautiful voice. I like it!
